channel.title: OpenBSD on Gremlin Mysteries
channel.description: Recent content in OpenBSD on Gremlin Mysteries

item.title: OpenBSD > Installation
item.description: OpenBSD Installation notes Accoutrements… Install with X and xenodm for desktop (6.4 defaults to fvwm) To list HDD/SSD/USB drives => sysctl hw.disknames To list partitions of drive sdX, etc. => disklabel (e.g. disklabel sd1) For urtwn-rtl8188eufw (Rosewill Realtek rtl8188eufw) => firmware.openbsd.org/firmware-dist/urtwn-1.2.tar.gz => cp /dir/urtwn-1.2.tar.gz /etc/firmware/urtwn-1.2.tar.gz => cd /etc/firmware => tar zvxf urtwn-1.2.tar.gz => cp /etc/firmware/urtwn-1.2/urtwn-rtl8188eufw /etc/firmware/urtwn-rtl8188eufw => ifconfig urtwn0 up => ifconfig urtwn0 scan => vi /etc/hostname.urtwn0 ++ join "mynetwork" ++ wpakey "mykey" ++ dhcp => reboot (had zero luck with ifconfig urtwn0 down/up)
